text: Following Bruce Marshall's original novel with considerable fidelity, the film tells the story of a little monk who prays that a disreputable night club near his church be removed. One night his prayer is answered and the offending establishment is suddenly transplanted to an island in the North Sea. But Father Malachias's troubles have only begun. Instead of having the desired effect, the miracle becomes exploited by a group of shrewd newspapermen.
